title: Project CARS: Game of the Year Edition, v11.2 + All DLCs
body:
Project CARS: Game of the Year Edition, v11.2 + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D
Company: Slightly Mad Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 22 GB
Repack Size: 9.9 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Project.CARS.Game.Of.The.Year.Edition-RELOADED ISO release: rld-prcagotye.iso (20,980,498,432 bytes)
  • All udates up to v11.2 applied
  • All available DLCs included & activated
  • Crack replaced with ALI213, alternatives from 3DM, CODEX and REVOLT available in NoDVD folder after installation. REVOLT crack allows multiplayer via Steam
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 22 to 9.9 GB)
  • [b]Installation time is pretty long due to game data, which is heavily compressed and encrypted. It takes ~1.5 hours on 8-cores CPUs, ~2 hours on 4-cores & 3+ hours on 2-cores. Mind this before downloading and installing.[/b]
  • HDD space after installation: 22 GB (~51 GB while installing)
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to select the game language

Game Description

Project CARS is the ultimate driver journey!

Guided, tested, and approved by a passionate community of racing fans and real-life drivers, Project CARS represents the next-generation of racing simulation as the ultimate combination of fan desire and developer expertise.

Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Create a driver, pick from a huge variety of motorsports in a dynamic career mode and write your own tale in an intense online multiplayer.

Featuring the largest track roster of any recent racing game with a ground-breaking dynamic time of day & weather system, deep tuning & pit stop functionality, and support for Oculus Rift and 12K ultra HD resolution, Project CARS leaves the competition behind in the dust.

Included content

  • Project CARS v11.2
  • Aston Martin Track Expansion
  • Audi Ruapuna Speedway Expansion Pack
  • Classic Lotus Track Expansion
  • eSports Package
  • Japanese Car Pack
  • Limited Edition Upgrade
  • Logitech Liveries
  • Modified Car Pack
  • Old Vs New Car Pack
  • Pagani Nurburgring Combined Track Expansion
  • Racing Icons Car Pack
  • Renault Sport Car Pack
  • Stanceworks Track Expansion
  • US Race Car Pack
  • Workshop Tool

Backwards Compatibility

This repack NOT backwards compatible with my previous repacks of PCARS.
